altername_name: Hissatsu Pachinko Station Petit 2 - Areddin tte Great!
name: Hissatsu Pachinko Station Puchi 2: Areddin tte Great!
overview: Hissatsu Pachinko Station Puchi 2 - Areddin the Great features the pachinko machine of the same name with different levels of zooms and complete technical information about the pachinko machine.
